author: Jerry-HXO
title: Great Location
text:
I stayed at the Hotel Lumen for two nights over a weekend and found the hotel to be ideal for my needs.
The location was perfect for touring central Paris either on foot or using the Metro with stations a few minutes walk away. The Louvre is literally at the end of the road.
The hotel is housed in an older building and is relatively small, with the rooms typically smaller than more modern hotels but the room and facilities were more than appropriate for our stay. The hotel decor is modern and the bar / restaurant off the lobby very convenient (albeit a little pricey). Breakfast (continental) was included in our stay and there was enough of a selection to cater for most tastes.
The service was very welcoming and happy to assist in any way.
A great little hotel in a very convenient spot and I'd certainly return given the opportunity.
